name: Hong Van

quote.author: Anonymous
quote.content: It's not a bug, it's an undocumented feature.

jobsDescriptions: He crafts responsive websites where technologies meet creativity
aboutMe: I'm a self-taught front-end developer based in Vietnam. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.

Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a year. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.
funFacts: I like winter more than summer
